des:
With alexa, you can control your lights, outlets, curtains, and all the RippHome products.
First of all, you should download and install our app: RippHome.
Second, you should buy at least one gateway device of ours.

Now let's see jobs rest:
1. Open RippHome app, register and login RippHome account.
2. When loading to main page, click the "+" icon on the right top and click "Add devices" in the menu popped.
3. Add all your lights, plugs, curtains and any RippHome products including the RippHome gateway.
4. When all devices are added, please click the new added RippHome gateway and configure the WiFi info: SSID and password.

Now, all the job in RippHome app is down, you can try to control all your device there for test and fun. And all the device should work perfectly.
Let's start setup your alexa and skills:
1. In your alexa app, click left-top menu icon and select "Skills" and search "RippHome".
2. Enable "RippHome" skill and this will lead you to the login page.
3. Input your RippHome account and password and go next.
4. Select the network to be controlled by alexa and done.

That's all, you can control your devices with alexa now!
